verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3947><s%>, Take thee a great <S%H1419><s%> tablet <S%H1549><s%>, and write <S%H3789><s%> upon it with the pen <S%H2747><s%> of a man <S%H582><s%>, For Maher-shalal <S%H4122><s%>-hash-baz;

and I will take <S%H5749><s%> unto me faithful <S%H539><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> to record <S%H5749><s%>, Uriah <S%H223><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeberechiah <S%H3000><s%>.

And I went <S%H7126><s%> unto the prophetess <S%H5031><s%>; and she conceived <S%H2029><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>. Then said <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto me <S%H7121><s%>, Call his name <S%H8034><s%> Maher-shalal <S%H4122><s%>-hash-baz.

For before the child <S%H5288><s%> shall have knowledge <S%H3045><s%> to cry <S%H7121><s%>, My father <S%H1><s%>, and <S%H517><s%>, My mother, the riches <S%H2428><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> shall be carried away <S%H5375><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me yet again <S%H3254><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Forasmuch <S%H3282><s%> as this people <S%H5971><s%> have refused <S%H3988><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Shiloah <S%H7975><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> softly <S%H328><s%>, and rejoice <S%H4885><s%> in Rezin <S%H7526><s%> and Remaliah <S%H7425><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>;

now therefore <S%H136><s%>, behold, the Lord bringeth up <S%H5927><s%> upon them the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the River <S%H5104><s%>, strong <S%H6099><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%>, even the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> and all his glory <S%H3519><s%>: and it shall come up <S%H5927><s%> over all its channels <S%H650><s%>, and go over <S%H1980><s%> all its banks <S%H1415><s%>;

and it shall sweep <S%H2498><s%> onward into Judah <S%H3063><s%>; it shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> and pass through <S%H5674><s%>; it shall reach <S%H5060><s%> even to the neck <S%H6677><s%>; and the stretching out <S%H4298><s%> of its wings <S%H3671><s%> shall fill <S%H4393><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%>, O Immanuel <S%H6005><s%>.

Make an uproar <S%H7489><s%>, O ye peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and be broken in pieces <S%H2865><s%>; and give ear <S%H238><s%>, all <S%H3605><s%> ye of far <S%H4801><s%> countries <S%H776><s%>: gird <S%H247><s%> yourselves <S%H2865><s%>, and be broken in pieces; gird <S%H247><s%> yourselves <S%H2865><s%>, and be broken in pieces.

Take <S%H5779><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> together <S%H5779><s%>, and it shall be brought to nought <S%H6565><s%>; speak <S%H1696><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%>, and it shall not stand <S%H6965><s%>: for God is with us <S%H410><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> thus to me with a strong <S%H2393><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and instructed <S%H3256><s%> me not to walk <S%H3212><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Say <S%H559><s%> ye not <S%H7195><s%>, A conspiracy, concerning all whereof this people <S%H5971><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, A conspiracy <S%H7195><s%>; neither fear <S%H3372><s%> ye their fear <S%H4172><s%>, nor be in dread thereof <S%H4172><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, him shall ye sanctify <S%H6942><s%>; and let him be your fear <S%H4172><s%>, and let him be your dread <S%H6206><s%>.

And he shall be for a sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>; but for a stone <S%H68><s%> of stumbling <S%H5063><s%> and for a rock <S%H6697><s%> of offence <S%H4383><s%> to both <S%H8147><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, for a gin <S%H6341><s%> and for a snare <S%H4170><s%> to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
And many <S%H7227><s%> shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> thereon <S%H5307><s%>, and fall, and be broken <S%H7665><s%>, and be snared <S%H3369><s%>, and be taken <S%H3920><s%>.
Bind thou up <S%H6887><s%> the testimony <S%H8584><s%>, seal <S%H2856><s%> the law <S%H8451><s%> among my disciples <S%H3928><s%>.
And I will wait <S%H2442><s%> for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that hideth <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and I will look for him <S%H6960><s%>.

Behold <S%H3206><s%>, I and the children whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> me are for signs <S%H226><s%> and for wonders <S%H4159><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, who dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>.

And when they shall say <S%H559><s%> unto you <S%H1875><s%>, Seek unto them that have familiar spirits <S%H178><s%> and unto the wizards <S%H3049><s%>, that chirp <S%H6850><s%> and that mutter <S%H1897><s%>: should not a people <S%H5971><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> unto their God <S%H430><s%>? on behalf of the living <S%H2416><s%> should they seek unto the dead <S%H4191><s%>?
To the law <S%H8451><s%> and to the testimony <S%H8584><s%>! if they speak <S%H559><s%> not according to this word <S%H1697><s%>, surely there is no morning for them <S%H7837><s%>.

And they shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through it <S%H7185><s%>, sore distressed and hungry <S%H7457><s%>; and it shall come to pass that <S%H7456><s%>, when they shall be hungry, they shall fret <S%H7107><s%> themselves <S%H7043><s%>, and curse by their king <S%H4428><s%> and by their God <S%H430><s%>, and turn <S%H6437><s%> their faces upward <S%H4605><s%>:

and they shall look <S%H5027><s%> unto the earth <S%H776><s%>, and behold <S%H6869><s%>, distress and darkness <S%H2825><s%>, the gloom <S%H4588><s%> of anguish <S%H6695><s%>; and into thick darkness <S%H653><s%> they shall be driven away <S%H5080><s%>.
